sentences.en: Chantal remembered carefree past summers at the beach.
sentences.cn: 钱特尔记起了从前在海滩上度过的无忧无虑的夏日时光。
人人欢欣快乐,无忧无虑.

sentences.en: He thought back to the carefree days of his childhood.
sentences.cn: 他回想起自己无忧无虑的童年时代。

sentences.en: He turned his face to look up at the sky in a carefree manner.
sentences.cn: 他仰首望着天,做出一副满不在乎的神气.

sentences.en: He's a carefree fellow who bears his responsibilities lightly.
sentences.cn: 他是个满不在意不大负责的人.

sentences.en: Her carefree laughter bubblled behind us.
sentences.cn: 在我们后面响起了她那爽朗的咯咯笑声.

sentences.en: Is this the carefree life with no responsibility that you wanted?
sentences.cn: 这是不是你要的无忧无虑的生活?

sentences.en: She daydreamed about a carefree vacation.
sentences.cn: 她梦想那无忧无虑的假期.

sentences.en: She had made their childhood so joyous and carefree.
sentences.cn: 她使他们的童年充满欢乐，无忧无虑。

sentences.en: Swallows fly about, carefree and at liberty.
The boy sat there, playing his toy leisurely and carefree.
sentences.cn: 那男孩坐在那里, 自由自在地玩着玩具.

sentences.en: These lovely children are very na � � ve and carefree.
sentences.cn: 这些可爱的孩子们非常纯真且无忧无虑.

sentences.en: They certainly gave the impression of a carefree couple who delighted in each other's company.
sentences.cn: 他们让人明显感觉是一对无牵无挂只求长相厮守的夫妻。

sentences.en: This carefree interlude reacted upon the young people like wine.
sentences.cn: 这一段轻松的插曲令年轻人陶醉.

sentences.en: Thumbing a lift had once a carefree, easy-going image.
sentences.cn: 伸手搭便车曾经给人以轻松随意的形象。

words.tran_cn: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地

trans.tran_cn: 无忧无虑的，快乐舒畅的，逍遥自在，宽畅，闲逸
